sources.name: salesdbds_customer
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  salesdbds_customer

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared salesdbds_customer = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("salesdb111.database.windows.net", "salesdb", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "store_customers"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = salesdbds_customer,
  已删除列 = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"credit_card"}),
  分组的行 = Table.Group(已删除列, {"country"}, {{"country_cnt", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}})
in
  分组的行;
